data.comment: The match has started, with Mouscron kicking-off.
Raphael Holzhauser is booked for the away team.
In the minute 12, Goal! Mouscron have got their heads in front thanks to a Jean Onana strike.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Beerschot have kicked-off the second half at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 56, Hernan Losada is making the team's first substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Mohamed Halaimia replacing Ayrton Mboko.
Goal! Mouscron extend their lead to 2-0 through Nuno Da Costa.
The away team have replaced Denis Prychynenko with Dario Van Den Buijs. This is the second substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
In the minute 61, Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a third substitution, with Abdoulie Sanyang replacing Tom Pietermaat.
Serge Tabekou is replacing Fabrice Olinga for the home team.
Goal! Serge Tabekou extends Mouscron's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 77, Beni Badibanga is on a sub for Nuno Da Costa for Mouscron.
Virgiliu Postolachi is replacing Bruno Xadas for Mouscron at Stade Le Canonnier.
Goal! Raphael Holzhauser pulls one back for Beerschot to make it 3-1.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
